decks.notes: The key idea of this deck is to use a combination of infect creatures and pump spells to quickly build up poison counters on the opponent, leading to a fast victory. The deck focuses on utilizing cards like Blighted Agent, Glistener Elf, and Phyrexian Crusader along with pump spells like Might of Old Krosa and Mutagenic Growth to deal infect damage. The mana base is optimized for consistency and efficiency, with lands like Inkmoth Nexus and Verdant Catacombs helping to support the strategy. This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast, lethal attacks before they can effectively respond.

This deck focuses on using creature-based combos and a toolbox approach to search for the right creatures at the right time. The key strategy involves sacrificing creatures to generate value and trigger abilities, such as draining life with Zulaport Cutthroat or creating snake tokens with Hapatra. Yawgmoth, Thran Physician is a key piece that allows for card draw and creature removal, while cards like Eldritch Evolution and Chord of Calling help find specific creatures needed for the situation. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with synergistic creature interactions and efficient mana usage.

This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard to enable powerful cards like Death's Shadow and Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger. It also utilizes cards like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to apply pressure early on. The deck aims to disrupt opponents with hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek, while also having efficient removal spells like Drown in the Loch and Unholy Heat. The companion, Lurrus of the Dream-Den, provides additional value by allowing the player to replay important creatures from the graveyard.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly assemble the necessary pieces to equip a creature with Colossus Hammer and swing in for lethal damage. Using efficient creatures like Puresteel Paladin and Stoneforge Mystic, along with support cards like Sigarda's Aid and Urza's Saga, this combo deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a massive threat early in the game. The addition of Lurrus of the Dream-Den as a companion provides additional value and recursion, making it even more difficult for opponents to handle the deck's aggressive strategy.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by using countermagic, removal spells, and card advantage to out-value the opponent. It aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while generating incremental advantage through cards like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Jace, the Mind Sculptor. The deck also utilizes the companion Kaheera, the Orphanguard for additional value. By effectively controlling the board and disrupting the opponent's game plan, the deck looks to win through attrition and overwhelming the opponent with powerful threats like Shark Typhoon and Celestial Colonnade.

This Jund Aggro deck focuses on using efficient creatures, disruptive spells, and powerful artifacts to control the board and apply pressure to the opponent. By combining fast creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Dragon's Rage Channeler with removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat, the deck aims to outpace and outmaneuver opponents. Additionally, the inclusion of Mishra's Bauble and Urza's Saga provides card advantage and extra resources to keep up the pressure. The deck's main strategy is to overwhelm opponents with a mix of aggression and disruption.

The key concept of this Modern 1 vs 1 Merfolk aggro deck is to utilize the synergies between Merfolk creatures and lords to create a fast and aggressive board presence. By using cards like Merfolk Trickster to disrupt opponents' strategies and Aether Vial to cheat creatures onto the battlefield, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with an army of powerful Merfolk creatures. By utilizing disruptive spells like Force of Negation and Vapor Snag, the deck can also control the opponent's board while pushing for damage. Ultimately, the goal is to quickly beat down the opponent before they can establish their own game plan.

The main concept of this deck is to synergize various low-cost artifact creatures and equipment cards in order to quickly assemble a lethal combination that can deal a huge amount of damage in a single turn. By utilizing cards like Puresteel Paladin, Stoneforge Mystic, and Colossus Hammer, along with support cards like Urza's Saga and Sigarda's Aid, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a powerful and efficient combo without giving them enough time to react. This aggressive strategy is bolstered by the inclusion of Lurrus of the Dream-Den as a companion, providing additional consistency and resilience to the deck.

This deck relies on utilizing cheap artifact creatures and equipment to quickly assemble a powerful combo that can deal lethal damage in one turn. By leveraging cards like Stoneforge Mystic and Puresteel Paladin to search for and equip Colossus Hammer, along with the ability to generate mana with Urza's Saga and Springleaf Drum, the deck aims to equip a creature with Colossus Hammer and deal massive amounts of damage in a single swing. With Lurrus of the Dream-Den as a companion, the deck can consistently bring back key pieces from the graveyard to maintain pressure.

The main idea behind this deck is to quickly assemble a powerful artifact-based combo using cards like Colossus Hammer, Puresteel Paladin, and Stoneforge Mystic. The deck aims to equip creatures with powerful equipment such as Cranial Plating and Shadowspear to deal massive damage to opponents early in the game. With the help of cards like Sigarda's Aid and Urza's Saga, the deck can efficiently search for and equip these artifacts, while also generating additional value through abilities like Esper Sentinel's card draw. The deck's strategy revolves around efficiently equipping creatures and overwhelming opponents with powerful attacks.

This deck focuses on using discard spells and hand disruption to control the opponent's resources while utilizing cards like The Rack and Liliana of the Veil to apply pressure. Smallpox and Delirium Skeins further disrupt the opponent's game plan while Urza's Saga provides additional utility and search options. Mishra's Factory adds a creature threat, while Fatal Push and Bloodchief's Thirst provide removal options. The mana base is optimized to support the strategy with Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth and fetch lands to ensure consistency in casting spells.

The deck focuses on ramping up quickly with mana acceleration cards like Azusa, Arboreal Grazer, and Amulet of Vigor to play powerful land-based threats like Primeval Titan and Dryad of the Ilysian Grove. Urza's Saga and Karn, the Great Creator provide additional utility and search options. The deck utilizes the unique land package with Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and Sunhome, Fortress of the Legion to close out games quickly. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with an explosive ramp strategy and powerful land synergies.
